snippet: When Dzhokhar Tsarnaev’s lead lawyer admitted her client’s role in the Boston Marathon bombings, she was using a play from Clarence Darrow’s book.
abstract: Defense for Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev being mounted by lawyer Judy Clarke bears resemblance to strategy used by Clarence Darrow to save his clients from death penalty almost century ago; Clarke's approach also is similar to so-called Svengali defense used in case against Lee Malvo, who was charged with aiding older accomplice kill 10 people in Washington, DC, area in 2002.
lead_paragraph: When Dzhokhar Tsarnaev’s lead lawyer admitted her client’s role in the Boston Marathon bombings, she was using a play from Clarence Darrow’s book.

headline.main: Defense in Marathon Bombing Has Echo of Clarence Darrow
